remarks: The standard bounded metric corresponding to ` C ` generates the same balls as ` C ` for radii less than ` R ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
statement:
stdbdmet.1 $e |- D = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> if ( ( x C y ) <_ R , ( x C y ) , R ) ) $.
stdbdbl $p |- ( ( ( C e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ R e. RR* /\ 0 < R ) /\ ( P e. X /\ S e. RR* /\ S <_ R ) ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) S ) = ( P ( ball ` C ) S ) ) $.
$d C x y $.
$d P x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d X x y $.
